name: SauceMaster
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sauce master
des:
Ask our very own Sauce Master for the recipe of your favorite sauce and it would be ready with image and recipe description for the sauce of your choice. With step by step instructions, you would be briefed about the sauce making procedure.

Special Feature: Great graphics and interactivity for Alexa with display devices.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
